data.actual_result: The microphone doesn’t get picked up UNLESS you are in the settings tab (which makes the streamed sound from the application choppy)
data.expected_result: Should be able to hear both game/application audio and also whoever is speaking with the htc vive
data.short_description: Unable to stream audio with htc vive microphone
data.steps_to_repro: - Turn on screen share with audio - go to settings and change microphone input to your htc vive - close settings and try to speak while streaming game audio
